title: Good Science/Crap Science
description:
Cathy O’Neil is back! She joins Felix Salmon, Emily Peck and Anna Szymanski to explain why COVID-19 models are confusing, talk about the media world’s big reckoning with its own racism, and discuss the Ford Foundation’s new bonds plan. 

In the Slate Plus segment: A tech startup that’s trying to detect women’s orgasm. 

Email: slatemoney@slate.com
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli.

Twitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @EmilyRPeck
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
